LVLH_INERTIAL.description: OID: 1.3.112.4.57.3.3 Local Vertical Local Horizontal inertial frame.

LVLH_ROTATING.description: OID: 1.3.112.4.57.3.2 Local Vertical Local Horizontal rotating frame.

OBJECT_TYPE.description: Object type (Payload, Rocket body, Debris, Unknown)

EUME.description: European Organization for the Exploitation of Meteorological Satellites (EUMETSAT)

LKA.description: Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka

MMR.description: Republic of the Union of Myanmar

PRES.description: People's Republic of China/European Space Agency

RCS.description: Radar Cross Section [meters2]; blank if no data available

ORBIT_TYPE.description: Orbit type (Orbit, Landing, Impact, Docked to RSO, roundtrip)

MANEUVERABLE.description: Indicates if the object is maneuverable

SIZE.description: Size [meters]; blank if no data available

MASS.description: Mass [kilograms]; blank if no data available

EPOCH.description: Epoch time, in ISO 8601 UTC format

OBJECT.description: Satellite name for the first object

CENTER_NAME.description: Origin of reference frame (EARTH, MARS, MOON, etc.)

REFERENCE_FRAME.description: Name of the reference frame (TEME, EME2000, etc.)

REFERENCE_FRAME_EPOCH.description: Epoch of reference frame, if not intrinsic to the definition of the reference frame

COV_REFERENCE_FRAME.description: Reference frame for the covariance matrix

TIME_SYSTEM.description: Time system used for the orbit state and covariance matrix. (UTC)

SCLK.description: Spacecraft Clock (receiver) (requires rules for interpretation in ICD)

START_TIME.description: Start of TOTAL time span covered by ephemeris data and covariance data (ISO 8601)

USEABLE_START_TIME.description: Optional start USEABLE time span covered by ephemeris data (ISO 8601)

USEABLE_STOP_TIME.description: Optional end of USEABLE time span covered by ephemeris data (ISO 8601)

STOP_TIME.description: End of TOTAL time span covered by ephemeris data and covariance data (ISO 8601)

STEP_SIZE.description: Step size in seconds separating the epochs of each ephemeris data row

INTERPOLATION.description: Recommended interpolation method for ephemeris data (Hermite, Linear, Lagrange, etc.)

INTERPOLATION_DEGREE.description: Recommended interpolation degree for ephemeris data

CLASSIFICATION.description:
OEM Header
Classification marking of the data in IC/CAPCO Portion-marked format.
